sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBBSMASTER (BBS_ID, BBS_TY_CODE, BBS_ATTRB_CODE, BBS_NM, BBS_INTRCN, REPLY_POSBL_AT, FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT, POSBL_ATCH_FILE_NUMBER, POSBL_ATCH_FILE_SIZE, TMPLAT_ID, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #bbsId#, #bbsTyCode#, #bbsAttrbCode#, #bbsNm#, #bbsIntrcn#, #replyPosblAt#, #fileAtchPosblAt#, #posblAtchFileNumber#, #posblAtchFileSize#, #tmplatId#, #useAt#, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, b.CODE_NM as BBS_TY_CODE_NM, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, c.CODE_NM as BBS_ATTRB_CODE_NM, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM FROM OE1TNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1014' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1015' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.USE_AT = #useAt#
a.BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(a.BBS_ID) totcnt FROM OE1TNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1014' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1015' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.USE_AT = #useAt#
a.BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')

SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, b.CODE_NM as BBS_TY_CODE_NM, a.BBS_INTRCN, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, c.CODE_NM as BBS_ATTRB_CODE_NM, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID, a.FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT, a.POSBL_ATCH_FILE_NUMBER, a.POSBL_ATCH_FILE_SIZE, a.REPLY_POSBL_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, e.MBER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM ,(SELECT IFNULL(USE_AT,'N') FROM OE1TNBBSUSE WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND TRGET_ID IN (#mberId#, 'SYSTEM_DEFAULT_BOARD') AND TRGET_ID = 'SYSTEM_DEFAULT_BOARD' ) as AUTH_FLAG FROM OE1TNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1014' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD WHERE CODE_ID = 'OE1015' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OE1TNUSERINFO e ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = e.MBER_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNBBSMASTER SET BBS_NM = #bbsNm#, BBS_INTRCN = #bbsIntrcn#, FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT = #fileAtchPosblAt#, POSBL_ATCH_FILE_NUMBER = #posblAtchFileNumber#, POSBL_ATCH_FILE_SIZE = #posblAtchFileSize#, TMPLAT_ID = #tmplatId#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId#
UPDATE COMTNBBSMASTER SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT BBS_ID, BBS_TY_CODE, BBS_ATTRB_CODE, BBS_NM, TMPLAT_ID FROM COMTNBBSMASTER WHERE USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID FROM COMTNBBSMASTER a, COMTNBBSUSE b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND b.TRGET_ID = #trgetId# AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.BBS_ID

b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
